00082 /// String describing quant method
00083 #define QUANTBRLMMP "brlmm-p"

00086 
00087 class snp_labeled_distribution
00088 {
00089 public:
00090     std::string probeset_id;
00091 
00092     snp_distribution Dist;
00093     //cluster_data bb;
00094     //cluster_data ab;
00095     //cluster_data aa;
00096     //double cv1; = xah
00097     //double cv2; = xab
00098     //double cv3; = xhb
00099 
00100     int compareTo(snp_labeled_distribution& that, int iCompareCode)
00101     {
00102         int iCompareResult = 0;
00103         switch (iCompareCode)
00104         {
00105         case 0:
00106             iCompareResult = probeset_id.compare(that.probeset_id);
00107             break;
00108         }
00109         return iCompareResult;
00110     }
00111 
00112     template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00113         bool operator()(const snp_labeled_distribution* lhs, const snp_labeled_distribution* rhs) const {
00114             Err::errAbort("snp_labeled_distribution: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00115             return false;
00116         }
00117     };
00118 };
00119 
00120 template<> struct snp_labeled_distribution::ComparePred<0> {
00121     bool operator()(const snp_labeled_distribution* lhs, const snp_labeled_distribution* rhs) const {
00122         return lhs->probeset_id.compare(rhs->probeset_id) < 0;
00123     }
00124 };

00128 /**
00129  * This is the primary class wrapping the bayes_label_routine
00130  * it handles bookkeeping, gender determination, etc
00131  */
00132 class QuantLabelZ : public QuantGTypeMethod {
00133 
00134 public:
00135 
00136   /// What transformation of intensity estimates to feed into classifier.
00137   
00138   class BrlmmParam {
00139     
00140   public:
00141 
00142     BrlmmParam() {
00143       m_HetMultiplier = 1;
00144       m_Iterations = 0;
00145       m_IterationThreshold = 0.6;
00146       m_K = 1;
00147       m_PriorPseudoCount = 20;
00148       m_Transform = MvA;
00149       m_MinCluster = 2;
00150       m_LowPrecision = false;
00151     }
00152     
00153     double m_HetMultiplier;          ///< Number to balance het calls with to balance performance on het/hom calls.
00154     int m_Iterations;                ///< How many iterations to do of LabelZ, i.e. boostrapping from initial calls.
00155     double m_IterationThreshold;      ///< What is our threshold (maximum value) for confidences befor 
00156                                      ///  calling 'NN' in iterative mode?
00157     double m_K;                      ///< Scaling Parameter to use in transformations.
00158     enum Transformation m_Transform; ///< What transformation of initial data are we feeding into the classifier?
00159     int m_PriorPseudoCount;          ///< How much weight should the prior get?
00160     int m_MinCluster;                ///< Minimum examples for each genotype to be included in prior estimation.
00161     bool m_LowPrecision;             ///< Summary values fed into R are usually truncated, should we do 
00162                                      /// that to be compatible? (used for regression tests)
00163   };
00164 
00165   bool m_OutputProbabilities;
00166   std::vector<double> m_Txa;         /// probability of AA call
00167   std::vector<double> m_Txh;         /// probability of het call
00168   std::vector<double> m_Txb;         /// probability of BB call
00169

00171   /** Constructor, currently creates prior estimates from pre-calculated data from R. */
00172   QuantLabelZ( enum Transformation transform,
00173                double K,
00174                bool lowPrecision);

00281   /** 
00282    * Get our confidence value for a particular call in a particular sample.
00283    * @param index - sample of interest.
00284    * @return - Confidence in the predicted call.
00285    */
00286   double getConfidence(unsigned int index) { 
00287     if(index >= m_Confidences.size()) {
00288       Err::errAbort("Asking for call at index " + ToStr(index) + " when Probeset " + 
00289                     m_ProbesetName + " has only " + ToStr(m_Confidences.size()) + " calls.");
00290     }
00291     return m_Confidences[index];
00292   }
00293 
00294   /** 
00295    * Returns standardized distances to cluster centers for given genotype.
00296    * @param genoType -  Genotype of interest.
00297    * @param index - sample of interest.
00298    * @return - Standardized distance to cluster center.
00299    */
00300   virtual double getConfGenotype(affx::GType genoType, unsigned int index) {
00301       ///@todo we should either implement this, or not output 
00302       ///      it in QuantMethodReportGTypeChipsummary
00303     assert(index < m_Distances[0].size());
00304     if(genoType == affx::NN)
00305       return FLT_MAX;
00306    // this matrix is reversed from BRLMM for convenience
00307    // in computing the distances vs subsets of the data
00308    // which occurs in chrX/Y cases in males/females
00309     return m_Distances[genoType][index];
00310 
00311     //return 0;
00312   }
00313  
00314   /** 
00315    * Get the summary value after transformation for the A and B alleles respectively.
00316    * 
00317    * @param index - Which chip to get values for.
00318    * @param aValue - Filled in with transformed a value.
00319    * @param bValue - Filled in with transformed b value.
00320    */
00321   void getAlleleValues(unsigned int index, double &aValue, double &bValue) {
00322     assert(index < m_AValues.size());
00323     assert(m_AValues.size() == m_BValues.size());
00324     aValue = m_AValues[index];
00325     bValue = m_BValues[index];
00326   }
00327 
00328   /**
00329    * Transform allele estimates
00330    */
00331   void transform() {
00332       GenoUtility_transformData(m_AValues, m_BValues, m_Param.m_Transform,m_Param.m_K);
00333   }
00334  /**
00335    * Set probeset selection data as 'probes'
00336    *
00337    * @param aVals - vector of allele A estimates
00338    * @param bVals - vector of allele B estimates
00339    */
00340   void setProbeSetSelect(std::vector<double> &aVals, std::vector<double> &bVals){
00341     const size_t NTarg = aVals.size();
00342     int NFeat = 1; // just the probeset
00343         m_PM_A.clear();
00344         m_PM_A.push_back(vector<double>(NTarg));
00345      
00346         m_PM_B.clear();
00347         m_PM_B.push_back(vector<double>(NTarg));
00348 
00349         for (size_t i=0; i< NTarg; i++){
00350             m_PM_A[0][i] = aVals[i];
00351             m_PM_B[0][i] = bVals[i];
00352         }
00353         m_A_probeId.assign(NFeat,0);
00354         m_B_probeId.assign(NFeat,0);
00355   }
00356   /**
00357    * Set allele values
00358    * 
00359    * @param aVals - vector of allele A estimates
00360    * @param bVals - vector of allele B estimates
00361    */
00362   void setAlleleValues(std::vector<double> &aVals, std::vector<double> &bVals) {
00363       m_AValues = aVals;
00364       m_BValues = bVals;
00365       if (m_SnpProbeTsv.is_open())
00366         setProbeSetSelect(aVals,bVals);
00367   }

00385   /** 
00386    * Get the summary value names for the A and B alleles respectively.
00387    *

00392   {
00393       pair<string,string> labels = columnNamesForTransformation(m_Param.m_Transform);
00394       aName = labels.first;
00395       bName = labels.second;
00396   }

00459   /**
00460    * sets the normalization functions for all samples
00461    * 
00462    * @param Qmap - normalization functions
00463    */
00464   void setNorm(vector<NormalizationPredictor> &Qmap)
00465   {
00466     normMap.resize(Qmap.size());
00467     for (unsigned int i=0; i<normMap.size(); i++)
00468     {
00469       normMap[i].Copy(Qmap[i]);
00470     }
00471   }

00565   /**
00566    * Sets the EM specific parameters for calling genders from chrX snps
00567    *
00568    * @param em_t - threshold for em
00569    * @param em_c - cutoff for em
00570    * @param g_c - cutoff for choosing genders
00571    */
00572   void setGenderParam(double em_t,double em_c,double g_c)
00573   {
00574     em_thresh = em_t;
00575     em_cutoff = em_c;
00576     gender_cutoff = g_c;
00577 
00578     // keep our options in sync so that the state is
00579     // correctly reported
00580     setOptValue("em_thresh", ToStr(em_thresh));
00581     setOptValue("em_cutoff", ToStr(em_cutoff));
00582     setOptValue("gender_cutoff", ToStr(gender_cutoff));
00583   }
